summary: Provides pytest extensions and helper utilities to support testing of the Diffusers example scripts, including custom commandâ€‘line options, terminal summaries, a base test class for accelerated runs, and functions to execute shell commands in isolated temporary environments.
business_intent: Enable reliable, automated validation of example code by supplying a reusable test framework that integrates with pytest and Accelerate, ensuring examples run correctly and can be easily executed in CI pipelines.
